description: Very handy app, simple and gets the job done!
Right now it dosen't offer much that you can't do in GIMP. Having a slider that lets you fade between images would be a very useful feature.

The functionality I am looking for is split screen view. It is the most obvious requirement for a image comparision tool. And, if a moving glass could be implemented, it would be a dream for pixel peeping... a circle/square with a cropped up section of one frame, overlaid over another.
summary: Excellent idea. A bit more functionality would make it perfect

description: Very useful for comparing video files encoded using different encoder parameters. Keyboard shortcuts available for fast switching between files and frames.
